snippet.title: Gurei | Steam PC | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Gurei is an action platformer where you face challenging enemies inspired by Japanese mythology and acquire their powers by defeating them.Choose your fights in any order, knowing that each opponent gets stronger as the game progresses!

Wishlist Now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2191280/Gurei/
